ContactController::send (  ) 

Sends the contact email if validation passes.

This method creates a contact email with the post data submitted by the user and delivers it to the website owner. Cookies are set for the user details if the remember_me flag has been set. If any of the validation steps fails, it performs a redirection to the action index. A redirection to the action thank_you is performed on success.

Definition at line 44 of file contact_controller.php.

ContactController::thank_you (  ) 

Shows thankfulness to the user for the contact email.

A delayed redirection to the Home controller is performed here.
